audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Demonstrates genuine transformation - creating commercial robotaxi market that didn't exist before. 10 million paid rides shows actual revenue generation from AI-as-the-product.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization (Waymo), specific metrics (100M miles, 10M rides), traceable to company disclosure.
audited_claims.notes: Strong tier 1 case - AI autonomy IS the product, creating new market category

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Safety performance validates the viability of the transformation - proving AI can replace human drivers commercially, not just assist them.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metrics (88% fewer serious injury crashes over 71M miles), first-party safety report, measurable comparison.
audited_claims.notes: Critical validation metric for transformation - proves AI can fully replace human capability

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Multi-city commercial expansion demonstrates scalable transformation - creating new transportation market across major metros.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named cities (Phoenix, SF, LA, Atlanta, Austin), specific vehicle model (Jaguar I-Pace), verifiable public service.
audited_claims.notes: Geographic scaling validates transformation is not limited to single market

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Manufacturing scale-up shows commitment to transformation - building industrial capacity for new market, not just R&D.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific facility details (239K sq ft Phoenix factory), concrete fleet expansion (2K vehicles added to 1.5K existing).
audited_claims.notes: Industrial scaling demonstrates serious commercial commitment beyond pilot programs

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Airport integration represents premium market penetration - transforming high-value transportation segment with AI-first service.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named airport (Phoenix Sky Harbor), specific achievement (first major airport), quantified usage (hundreds of thousands of trips).
audited_claims.notes: Premium market penetration validates transformation can capture high-value segments

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Emergency handling capability demonstrates AI system maturity - proving transformation can handle edge cases that would break traditional automation.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific incident (power outage), quantified performance (7,000 dark signals navigated), company disclosure.
audited_claims.notes: Edge case handling proves AI system robustness required for true transformation

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Extensive testing validates transformation readiness - AI system has accumulated experience equivalent to human lifetime driving across multiple markets.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metrics (10M real miles, 10B simulation miles, 25 cities), verifiable scope of testing program.
audited_claims.notes: Testing scale demonstrates systematic approach to validating transformation technology

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Commercial infrastructure development shows complete business model transformation - building all systems needed for AI-first transportation company.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Comprehensive scope (legislation, fleet management, dispatch system), demonstrates full commercial operation capability.

apqc_functions.name: Develop and manage IT resilience and risk

audited_claims.notes: Complete infrastructure build-out proves systematic transformation, not just technology demonstration

tier_verification: Correctly classified as tier 1. This represents genuine transformation - Waymo has created a new market (commercial robotaxis) where AI autonomy IS the product, not a supporting tool. The 'remove the AI' test is decisive: without AI, there is no product. All claims support business model transformation from traditional transportation to AI-first mobility service.
